snippet: The deal, which values BuzzFeed at about $1.5 billion, includes plans for the new and old media companies to work together on television, movies, the Olympics and partnerships with marketers.
abstract: NBCUniversal will invest $200 million into digital media hub Buzzfeed; deal includes plans for both companies to collaborate on television, movies, Olympic coverage and partnerships with marketers.
lead_paragraph: The deal, which values BuzzFeed at about $1.5 billion, includes plans for the new and old media companies to work together on television, movies, the Olympics and partnerships with marketers.

headline.main: NBCUniversal to Invest $200 Million in BuzzFeed
headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; NBCUniversal to Invest $200 Million in BuzzFeed
